testcase.name: Testing invalid payment information
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to home page and login into test account...................passed Then I should be logged in..................................................passed When I perform searching for flight from DUB to SXF on 25-05-2019 for 2 adults and 1 child.passed And I choose the following options: flight with standard fare, small bags, random seats.passed Then I should be on checkout page...........................................passed When I provide personal info and pay for booking with card details 5555 5555 5555 5557, 10/19 and 265.passed Then I should get payment declined message..................................passed
